applicant-name.name: HUNAN XINGBIDA NETWORK TECH CO LTD
湖南行必达网联科技有限公司

invention-title: Thermal management system of high-power fuel cell vehicle and control method of thermal management system
一种大功率燃料电池车辆的热管理系统及其控制方法

abstract.p: The invention provides a thermal management system of a high-power fuel cell vehicle and a control method of the thermal management system. The system comprises a fuel cell thermal management unit, an auxiliary heat dissipation unit and a power cell thermal management unit, the fuel cell heat management unit is internally provided with a high-pressure fan and a first cooling liquid loop which are used for dissipating heat of a fuel cell of the vehicle; a second cooling liquid loop is arranged in the auxiliary heat dissipation unit and is used for auxiliary heat dissipation of the fuel cell of the vehicle; a third cooling liquid loop based on a plate heat exchanger, and a first refrigerant loop and a second refrigerant loop which are respectively connected with the third cooling liquid loop in parallel are arranged in the power battery thermal management unit, and the power battery thermal management unit is used for cooling a power battery of the vehicle; according to the invention, the heat dissipation requirements of the fuel cell and the power cell of the high-power hydrogen energy automobile can be simultaneously met, the heat dissipation performance and the heat dissipation efficiency are improved, the energy utilization rate can be improved, and the energy consumption is reduced.

本发明提供一种大功率燃料电池车辆的热管理系统及其控制方法，系统包括：燃料电池热管理单元、辅助散热单元和动力电池热管理单元；燃料电池热管理单元中设置有用于为车辆的燃料电池散热的高压风扇和第一冷却液回路；辅助散热单元中设置有第二冷却液回路，用于为车辆的燃料电池辅助散热；动力电池热管理单元中设置有基于板式换热器的第三冷却液回路，以及分别与第三冷却液回路并联的第一冷媒回路和第二冷媒回路，用于为车辆的动力电池散热；本发明能够同时满足大功率氢能源汽车燃料电池及动力电池的散热需求，提高散热性能和散热效率，另外还能够提高能量利用率，降低能耗。
